meaningMnemonic: A <radical>cross</radical> carrying <radical>drunkard</radical> wants you to go to a <radical>rice paddy</radical> <radical>together</radical> so you can <kanji>receive</kanji> something from them.
readingMnemonic: Against your better judgement, you decided to go and <kanji>receive</kanji> the thing. You close your eyes, hold out your hands, and feel a silky, light <reading>tie</reading> (たい) being placed in them.
